summary: After failing the audition to a prestigious music school because of the rude behavior of one of the testers, a girl takes revenge by gaining the trust of the same woman some years later and becoming indispensable for her.
cast: Catherine Frot|Déborah François|Pascal Greggory|Clotilde Mollet|Xavier de Guillebon|Christine Citti|Jacques Bonnaffé|Antoine Martynciow|Julie Richalet|Martine Chevallier|André Marcon|Arièle Butaux|Michèle Ernou|Danièle Douet|Mark Reed|Jean Chrétien|François Rosolato|Alexis Monceaux|Jacques Sotty|Catherine Lebaigue|Frédéric Moulin|Émilie Reignier|Marion Sicre|Pomme Bourcart|Juliette Bône|Caroline Mathieu|Moussa Ag Assarid|Karim Adelis|Danièle Renaud|Julie Primot|François Guillaume
title: La última nota
